item.title: git CLI
item.description: commit git commit -m "描述" add 新增要紀錄的檔案 git add . 切換分支 git checkout develop pull ❯ git pull hint: You have divergent branches and need to specify how to reconcile them. hint: You can do so by running one of the following commands sometime before hint: your next pull: hint: hint: git config pull.rebase false # merge hint: git config pull.rebase true # rebase hint: git config pull.ff only # fast-forward only hint: hint: You can replace "git config" with "git config --global" to set a default hint: preference for all repositories.
